pullRequest.title: Feature/copy paste from histogram #741
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change

Added functionality to copy property values from a bar selection on the Histogram View to the clipboard via a right-click context menu or via ctrl+c. The context menu also provides an option to copy property values and their associated counts.
Also limited selections of bars to only left-click on the mouse instead of previously being activated by left-click, right-click or clicking the mouse wheel.
Alternate Designs

N/A
Why Should This Be In Core?

N/A
Benefits

Copying values from the Histogram View will be more time efficient for users.
Possible Drawbacks

N/A
Verification Process

Tested by copying various bar selections, including both with shift held down or control held down, then either using ctrl+c or the right-click context menu to copy values to a text editor to verify whether the correct values were copied across.
Applicable Issues

#741

commit.message:
Copy paste Histrogram functionality added

Ctrl + C and right click context menu added.
